repos.description: BitConnect coin is an open source, peer-to-peer, community driven decentralized cryptocurrency that allow people to store and invest their wealth in a non-government controlled currency, and even earn a substantial interest on investment. The BitConnect coins are used by bitconnect community members for bitconnect services and to store and invest the wealth in a non-government controlled currency. The BitConnect coins will also be used  as payment system on number of BitConnect partner websites. BitConnect coin uses a special algorithm called the POW/POS to secure the BitConnect Coin network.
